name: bxnotes
description: blog about web developing and coding
author: Valerii Diachenko

scripts.dev: gulp removeSiteData && gulp copyMinifyedManifest && gulp copyIcons && concurrently "gulp watchCssAndMakeBundle" "eleventy --serve --watch"
scripts.prod: gulp removeSiteData && gulp makeCssBundle && gulp copyRedirectFile && gulp copyMinifyedManifest && gulp copyIcons && eleventy
